name: ModerateRespiratoryComplicationsWithLOSProcedures
title: Moderate Respiratory complications with LOS Procedures
purpose: (Clinical Focus: The purpose of this value set is to group concepts of procedures for moderate respiratory complications combined with length of stay.),(Data Element Scope: This value set may use a model element related to procedure.),(Inclusion Criteria: Includes concepts that represent a procedure for a moderate respiratory complication combined with length of stay.),(Exclusion Criteria: No exclusions.)
